title: I understand that a gentleman died in the New Hanover County Department of Social Services lobby on June 25, 2010 and nothing was every reported, it was also stated that their were two sheriff deputies right there and no first aid equipment could be found because recently the lobby had been remodeled.  This is unacceptable and the agency should be held accountable.  What has been done to correct this?
text:
This isn't the sort of question we usually answer through
MyReporter, but I'll pass this along as a possible story.
